translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Udaka and the Seat
The Story of the Elder Vaṇṇakāra
At the shrine, I dyed cloth
In the past, twenty-one eons ago,
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving dye.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā vaṇṇakāro thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā vaṇṇakāraḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the elder Vaṇṇakāra recited these verses.
The Story of the Elder Vaṇṇakāra is the sixth.
